content.content: Since we have already approved a higher debt ceiling, we request executive inclusion of this change, as engineering resources allow  Parameter Summary: SNE-001 (Starknet Engineering Core Unit) is requesting that the following changes are included in an Executive Vote: Bridge limit (escrow limit):  Set the Starknet bridge limit at DAI 1Mn   Details:  Protocols on Starknet are complaining about the low bridge limit which prevents them from adding liquidity to their pools and protocols Governance voted the initial DAI bridge limit on Starknet to be DAI 5Mn (poll link, forum link) Our current limit is DAI 200k and we are looking to increase it to DAI 1Mn. We will not increase further the limit until we complete the migration as part of Starknet regenesis.
content.GPT-summary: The post is a proposal by SNE-001 (Starknet Engineering Core Unit) requesting an Executive Vote to increase the bridge limit on Starknet to DAI 1Mn. The proposal explains the need for the change and the current limitations faced by protocols on Starknet. The post also invites feedback and questions from third parties and acknowledges the need for constructive criticism.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
